title: News24.com | Lockdown: Mbalula cuts loading capacity for taxis, rescinding earlier decision
description: Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula has rescinded his earlier decision of allowing taxis to carry a full load of passengers.
content:
Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula has rescinded his earlier
decision of allowing taxis to carry a full load of passengers.
They would only be allowed a loading capacity of 70% and not a full load as
many operators had wished for, he said.
Mbalula had earl… [+2140 chars]
